salesforce:query-single.doc:name: Query contact in Salesforce B
salesforce:query-single.salesforce:salesforce-query: SELECT Id, LastModifiedDate FROM Contact WHERE Email = ':email'

salesforce:query-single.doc:name: Query account in Salesforce B
salesforce:query-single.salesforce:salesforce-query: SELECT Id FROM Account WHERE Name = ':name'

choice.doc:name: Should be a new Account created?

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- { AccountNumber: payload.Account.AccountNumber, Description : payload.Account.Description, Name: payload.Account.Name, NumberOfEmployees : payload.Account.NumberOfEmployees, Industry: payload.Account.Industry }

logger.doc:name: Log - Existing Account Id already set!
logger.message: Log - Existing Account Id already set!

salesforce:upsert-bulk.doc:name: Upsert bulk - Contacts in Salesforce B

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output text/plain --- "Migration Report: 
"
++ "
 Time [milliseconds]: " ++ payload.elapsedTimeInMillis! ++ "
 Total Records: " ++ payload.totalRecords! ++ "
 Successful Records: " ++ payload.successfulRecords! ++ "

salesforce:query.doc:name: Query Accounts from Salesforce instance A
salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: SELECT Description,Email,FirstName,LastName,LastModifiedDate,MailingCountry,Title, Account.Id, Account.Name, Account.AccountNumber, Account.Description, Account.Industry, Account.NumberOfEmployees FROM Contact WHERE (MailingCountry = 'US' AND Email <> '') ORDER BY Email ASC
